fullDescription.intro: Reader for Parquet files. It reads either single files or all files in a given directory. Does support INT, LONG, DOUBLE and String.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The file or directory to read.
Whether to read the row key from the file.

tab.name: Advanced
tab.option: The number of rows in each read batch.

ports.inPort: Optional port for a remote connection.
ports.outPort: Data table containing the data of the Parquet file.
